mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (name, is_admin, contents, views, category_id, user_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{isAdmin}, #{contents}, #{views}, #{categoryId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, is_admin AS isAdmin, contents, create_time AS createTime, views, category_id AS categoryId, user_id AS userId, update_time AS updateTime FROM posts WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT id, user_id AS userId, category_id AS categoryId, name, contents, is_admin AS isAdmin, views, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM posts WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET name = #{name}, contents = #{contents}, views = #{views}, category_id = #{categoryId}, user_id = #{userId}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
